config: People from our different teams took part in another edition of the virtual "Escape Game." The objective was to escape or find something hidden in each room in the shortest possible time. To achieve this goal, team members had to apply different skills. We appreciate your enthusiastic participation and commitment to winning. We look forward to seeing you in the next edition!

On August 31st, we held another edition of our Just Meet Up! The talk: Fundamentals of Web Design for Non-Designers, was presented by our teammate Paola Gonzalez. The virtual conference was coordinated by our colleagues Eduardo Garcia and Adalit Flores. It was wonderful having everyone's active involvement. The talk was remarkably informative, and we received great feedback from the audience.
